cast.name: 卜提·阿尤蒂雅 Putri Ayudya
科尔内略·森尼 Cornelio Sunny

introduction: Pipin Kartika (Putri Ayudya) is obsessed to get 'bule' a.k.a foreigner boyfriend to be her husband. By the age of 30 she still hasn't got it. Almost frustrated because she always met a jerk bule in Jakarta, Pipin decided to move to Bali to seek love. Arriving in Bali, for the help of her best friend, Arik (Michael Kho), Pipin acquainted with the mulatto man, Buyung (Natalius Chendana). Pipin initially liked Buyung, but after she knows that Buyung was her childhood friend disguised as a bule, so Pipin will love him, Pipin then close her heart to like him as a boyfriend and tried to get in touch with an Italian gentleman named Gianfranco (Cornelio Sunny). Pipin fall in love, but her dream was destroyed after Gianfranco was a liar. Pipin become used to be, a single woman with saving deposits and with no bule boyfriend. Haunted by the fear of being an old maid, she made one last attempt to gain true love in her life.
